SENSOR_SWITCH_TOOLTIP: Return True if the switch on the specific sensor port is pressed.
SENSOR_JUST_PRESSED: พึ่งจะถูกกด
SENSOR_JUST_PRESSED_TOOLTIP: Do statements once when the switch just pressed.
SENSOR_JUST_RELEASED: พึ่งจะถูกปล่อย
SENSOR_JUST_RELEASED_TOOLTIP: Do statements once when the switch just released.
